channel.title: Obama no birth certificate
channel.description:
Its old news. You may have or may not have heard this.
But Obama does not have a [i]found[/i] American Birth Certificate.
Do you believe yes/no?
Do you like obama why/why not.
No spam or flame of why Americans suck or why he is black (or flame/spam at all)
Discuss..

item.title: Obama no birth certificate
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

You’re all retarded in your own way.

Not really something to discuss, you can think all you want or know what you want. This turned into a flame war. Really off-topic to

Reaper, if you feel like unlocking this feel free to do so.

Read full topic
